ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Question for you druids out there ...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, if you group up with someone, skip the please. You will notice that you ll have to say please 200 times / hour if you don t. Zing please. Speed please.
ygData.messageBody:
Well, if you group up with someone, skip the please. You will notice that
you'll have to say please 200 times / hour if you don't.

Zing please.
Speed please.
Sta please.
Str please.
Dex please.
DMF please.
Bulk please.
Symbol please.
Hero please.
Clarity please.
Shield please.
GRM please.
Kragg please.
Acumen please.

and so on.

Get's kinda boring if you are 6 ppl in group to listen and people will start
to say please rather than listen to event/group leader. Just /tell the one
you want a buff from, and don't use /ooc or /shout.

-domi

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nymue Ce'Nedra [SMTP:nymue_uberdruid@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 03, 2001 2:39 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Question for you druids out there ...
>
>
> Hi Mu :)
>
> < I don't see what is so rude about "Can I get a
> SoW?". Maybe its just me, don't know. >
>
> It's just that they don't say please, and this really
> irks me. My parents had this annoying thing they did
> to me growing up where if I said something like "Can I
> get some orange juice?" they'd say "I don't know, can
> you?" intending me to say "May I please have some
> juice." So I'm warped anyway ;-P
>
> Besides, saying "please" is only polite, I think.
>
> Cheers,
> Nymue
>
> =====
> Nymue Ce'Nedra
> Wood Elf Druid, Cazic-Thule Server
